intro: Stormia, commonly known as the stormia tree, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Ericaceae. Stormia species typically thrive in well-drained, acidic soils and require a cool, moist climate. Due to its ornamental value and ecological significance, it is sometimes cultivated in botanical gardens and conservation areas.
